description: {"blocks":[{"key":"9k9ch","text":"This protocol describes collection of protein from cultured cells and immunoblotting.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

status.info: We use this protocol and it's working

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"7gj3i","text":"Culture K562 or COS-7 (ATCC) at    and 5% CO2, using RPMI for K562 or DMEM for COS-7 containing 10% FBS,   sodium pyruvate,   penicillin,    streptomycin,    L-glutamine,    non-essential amino acids, (all from Gibco) and   plasmocin (InvivoGen).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":32,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":105,"length":1},{"key":2,"offset":124,"length":1},{"key":3,"offset":138,"length":1},{"key":4,"offset":155,"length":1},{"key":5,"offset":171,"length":1},{"key":6,"offset":222,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"D80943E62D6B11EEB86E0A58A9FEAC02","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"37","unit":10}},"1":{"type":"concentration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"concentration":"1","error_concentration":false,"error_temperature":false,"guid":"D80944792D6B11EEB86E0A58A9FEAC02","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"37","unit":28}},"2":{"type":"concentration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"concentration":"100","error_concentration":false,"error_temperature":false,"guid":"D80944FF2D6B11EEB86E0A58A9FEAC02","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"37","unit":2715}},"3":{"type":"concentration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"concentration":"100","error_concentration":false,"error_temperature":false,"guid":"D80945822D6B11EEB86E0A58A9FEAC02","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"37","unit":2732}},"4":{"type":"concentration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"concentration":"2","error_concentration":false,"error_temperature":false,"guid":"D809460B2D6B11EEB86E0A58A9FEAC02","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"37","unit":28}},"5":{"type":"concentration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"concentration":"1","error_concentration":false,"error_temperature":false,"guid":"D80946972D6B11EEB86E0A58A9FEAC02","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"37","unit":2733}},"6":{"type":"concentration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"concentration":"2.5","error_concentration":false,"error_temperature":false,"guid":"D80947122D6B11EEB86E0A58A9FEAC02","id":0,"label {"blocks":[{"key":"cot0t","text":"Prior to K562 lysis, pellet the cells by centrifuging at   . Resuspend the pellet in PBS, centrifuging and repeating for a total of 3 times.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":57,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"centrifuge","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"centrifuge":"1100","duration":300,"error_centrifuge":false,"error_temperature":false,"guid":"A404CD002D6C11EEAC2ACF8B4EC33A77","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"scientificNotation":{"centrifuge":false,"temperature":false},"start":null,"temperature":"4","temperatureUnit":10,"unit":33}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"2k3fs","text":"Lyse cells with 2% SDS by either resuspending (K562) or adding to culture dish and scraping using a Corning cell-lifter (COS-7). Sonicate lysates using 3x10s pulses with Virsonic 550 (Virtis).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"fo0b6","text":"Centrifuge    and collect the post-nuclear supernatant in a new Eppendorf tube.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":11,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"centrifuge","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"centrifuge":"13300","duration":600,"error_centrifuge":false,"error_temperature":false,"guid":"AE18A5402D6D11EEAC2ACF8B4EC33A77","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"scientificNotation":{"centrifuge":false,"temperature":false},"start":null,"temperature":"","temperatureUnit":32,"unit":33}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"884p4","text":"Prepare gel apparatus with 4-12% Tris Glycine gels (Invitrogen) and Tris-Glycine SDS running buffer.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
